question.title: Actors and Directors Who Cooperated At Least Three Times
mysqlSchemas: Create table If Not Exists ActorDirector (actor_id int, director_id int, timestamp int)

insert into ActorDirector (actor_id, director_id, timestamp) values ('2', '1', '6')
